locations.description: Section 1 summarizing goals, requirements, and assumptions.
Section 2 detailing architectural style, stack, components, data models, and APIs.
Section 2.1 listing diagrams, specs, and artifacts planned per iteration.
Section 3 showing proposed repository tree with docs/api/src/test areas.
Section 4 listing command rules, anchor policy, quality gates.
Intro to Section 5 with total iterations and dependency summary.
Iteration I1 setup goals, KPIs, risks.
Upgrade Quarkus/Maven tooling and record ADR.
Produce system context and container diagrams.
Create ERD and schema documentation.
Document job queues and handler skeleton.
Configure TypeScript/esbuild/frontend-maven integration.
Stand up docker-compose dev stack and env templates.
Implement CI pipeline with lint/test/build gates.
Setup logging, metrics, tracing configuration.
Define security/secrets baseline and documentation.
Iteration I2 covering identity, feature flags, preferences, rate limits.
Implement OIDC bootstrap and anonymous cookies.
Build FeatureFlagService, migrations, admin APIs.
Create RateLimitService, violation logging, admin controls.
Deliver anonymous merge flow with consent + cleanup.
Define UserPreferenceService schema + endpoints.
Implement homepage layout with gridstack integration.
Publish OpenAPI draft for auth/preferences/widgets.
Seed admin roles/permissions and RBAC endpoints.
Add automated tests covering personalization and rate limits.
Iteration I3 for feeds, AI tagging, weather, stocks, social, storage.
Create RSS source/item schema and admin APIs.
Implement RSS refresh job + telemetry.
Build AI tagging pipeline with budget enforcement.
Integrate weather providers, cache, and widget API.
Implement stock service/watchlist/refresh jobs.
Deliver social integration with token refresh + widget state.
Create StorageGateway for Cloudflare R2 operations.
Expose widget REST endpoints for news/weather/stocks/social.
Add monitoring dashboards and alerting for content services.
Iteration I4 covering geo import, listings, payments, search, contact, moderation.
Import geo dataset and configure PostGIS indexes.
Seed marketplace categories and admin CRUD.
Implement marketplace listings, endpoints, expiration jobs.
Integrate Stripe for fees/promotions and refund workflow.
Build marketplace search with PostGIS + Elasticsearch.
Implement listing image storage + processing jobs.
Deliver masked email contact system + inbound processor.
Build moderation/fraud detection + analytics.
Run marketplace regression tests and analytics wiring.
Iteration I5 for Good Sites directory, screenshots, karma, AI categorization.
Create directory categories schema and admin UI.
Implement directory sites, submissions, moderation workflow.
Build screenshot capture service and job handlers.
Deliver karma/trust system and admin adjustments.
Create Good Sites browsing UI and moderation endpoints.
Integrate AI categorization + bulk import tooling.
Add link health + ranking jobs and docs.
Extend analytics to include Good Sites metrics.
QA/regression + release checklist for Good Sites.
Iteration I6 for profiles, analytics, GDPR, manifest completion.
Create profile schemas, services, and APIs.
Implement profile templates + editors.
Deliver curated article tooling + refresh job.
Extend click tracking + rollups for profiles.
Build admin analytics dashboards with AntV charts.
Implement GDPR export/deletion jobs + endpoints.
Create notification templates for profiles/analytics/privacy.
Author verification strategy and glossary sections.
Execute final regression, finalize manifest, produce checklist.
Section 6 summarizing testing strategy, CI/CD, rollout, support.
Section 7 defining plan terminology and component names.
